mapper.select: SELECT 'CLUB_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(CLUB_CODE, 6))), 0) + 1,3 , '0') FROM BOOK_CLUB
SELECT COUNT(MEM_ID) FROM BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER WHERE CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode} AND CLUB_MEM_STATUS = 2
SELECT CLUB.CLUB_CODE , CLUB_NAME , CLUB_SHORT_INFO , BC_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM BOOK_CLUB CLUB, BOOK_CLUB_IMAGE IMG WHERE CLUB.CLUB_CODE = IMG.CLUB_CODE ORDER BY CLUB_CODE

SELECT CLUB.CLUB_CODE , CLUB_NAME , CLUB_SHORT_INFO , CLUB_INTRO , CLUB_MEM_CNT , BC_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME , MEM_ID FROM BOOK_CLUB CLUB, BOOK_CLUB_IMAGE IMG WHERE CLUB.CLUB_CODE = IMG.CLUB_CODE AND CLUB.CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode}

SELECT BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_WRITER , MEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , READ_CNT , (SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUM) FROM COMMUNITY_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM = CB .BOARD_NUM) AS REPLY_CNT , CLUB_CODE , CLUB_NOTICE FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CB, MEMBER M WHERE BOARD_WRITER = MEM_ID AND CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode} AND CLUB_NOTICE = 'Y'
SELECT 'BOARD_'||LPAD(NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(BOARD_NUM, 7))), 0) + 1,3 , '0') FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD

SELECT CB.BOARD_NUM , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE , READ_CNT , CLUB_CODE , BC_ATTACHED_FILE_NAME FROM COMMUNITY_BOARD CB, COMMUNITY_IMAGE CM WHERE CB.BOARD_NUM = CM.BOARD_NUM(+) AND CB.BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
SELECT REPLY_NUM , REPLY_CONTENT , REPLY_WRITER , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE FROM COMMUNITY_REPLY WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum} ORDER BY REPLY_NUM DESC

SELECT ACCEPT_CODE , M.MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(CLUB_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLUB_REG_DATE FROM BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER CM, MEMBER M WHERE CM.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode} AND CLUB_MEM_STATUS = 2 ORDER BY ACCEPT_CODE

SELECT ACCEPT_CODE , CM.MEM_ID , MEM_NAME , TO_CHAR(CLUB_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLUB_REG_DATE FROM BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER CM, MEMBER M WHERE CM.MEM_ID = M.MEM_ID AND CLUB_CODE = #{clubCode} AND CLUB_MEM_STATUS = 1

SELECT ACCEPT_CODE , CM.CLUB_CODE , CLUB_NAME , TO_CHAR(CLUB_REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CLUB_REG_DATE , CLUB_MEM_STATUS , CLUB_MEM_CNT FROM BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER CM, BOOK_CLUB CLUB WHERE CM.CLUB_CODE = CLUB.CLUB_CODE AND CM.MEM_ID = #{memId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER SET CLUB_MEM_STATUS = 2 WHERE ACCEPT_CODE = #{acceptCode}
UPDATE BOOK_CLUB_MEMBER SET CLUB_MEM_STATUS = 3 WHERE ACCEPT_CODE = #{acceptCode}
UPDATE COMMUNITY_BOARD SET READ_CNT = READ_CNT + 1 WHERE BOARD_NUM = #{boardNum}
